TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Kalahaay, title = Kalahaay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalahaay} }

S.FORM: alang Kalahaay ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Cinkong Song, kwara sali buwan nya ga 738 buwan, 2,154 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 15% kyan ku 316 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 85% kyan ku 1,838 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 13%, Paywan 0.4%, Puyuma 0.4%, binah lihuyan s'uli 0.5%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Kalahaay hya' ga Cirarokohay. tay 'zil na Kalahaay hya' ga Madawdaw. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Kalahaay ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Kalahaay ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Cinkong Song, kwara sali bowan nya ga 738 bowan, 2,154 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 15% kyan ko 316 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 85% kyan ko 1,838 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 13%, Paywan 0.4%, Poyoma 0.4%, binah lihoyan s'oli 0.5%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Kalahaay hya' ga Cirarokohay. tay 'zil na Kalahaay hya' ga Madawdaw. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Kalahaay ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
